title: User receives error if stats are found on or after tx date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has created a tx
AND has entered a tx date
AND the player has stats entered after assignment date
custom_expected:
THEN show error
AND BOC only can ignore and continue

title: User receives error if stats are found on or after tx date
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has a tx for a player w/stats on or after assignment date
custom_expected: THEN show error (ignore and continue BOC only)

title: User will receive an error if stats are found for a player on or after the entered transaction date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to submit or approve a Place on Deceased List tx for a player
AND selected player has stats from a game on or after entered transaction date
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Approve" (all places OnSubmit rules are fired)
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "Statistics have been found for the player on or after the entered placement date. "
AND clicking "Back" should close the modal and return user to the tx
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with the tx (BOC only)

title: User will receive an error when stats are found for a player on or after the entered tx date
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has a player w/stats entered after the tx date

title: User can receive an error if stats are found for a player on or after the entered tx date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has a Place on Military List 
AND the player has any stats on or after the entered transaction date
custom_expected: THEN the error will display "Statistics have been found for the player on or after the entered placement date. "

title: User will receive an error when stats are found for a player on or after the entered tx date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has a Place on Voluntarily Retired List tx
AND the player has any stats on or after the entered transaction date
custom_expected:
THEN the error will display "Statistics have been found for the player on or after the entered placement date. "
AND Clicking Ignore and Continue (only available for the BOC) will ignore the error and continue with the transaction.

title: User will receive an error when stats are found for a player on or after the entered tx date
custom_preconds: GIVEN the player has any stats on or after the entered transaction date.
custom_expected: THEN the error will display "Statistics have been found for the player on or after the entered placement date. "

title: User will receive an error when stats are found for a player on or after the entered tx date
custom_preconds: GIVEN the player has any stats on or after the entered transaction date
custom_expected: THEN the error will display "Statistics have been found for the player on or after the entered placement date. "

title: User will receive an error when stats are found for a player on or after the entered tx date
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has a player w/stats entered after tx date
custom_expected: THEN show error: "Statistics have been found for the player on or after the entered placement date. "

title: User can receive an error if stats are found for a player on or after the entered tx date
custom_preconds: GIVEN the player has stats after the tx date
custom_expected: THEN show error (ignore and continue BOC only)

title: User will receive an error when stats are found for a player on or after the entered tx date
custom_preconds: GIVEN the player has stats entered after the current tx's assignment date
custom_expected: THEN show error (ignore and continue BOC only)

title: User will receive an error when stats are found for a player on or after the entered transaction date
custom_preconds: GIVEN the player has stats entered after the assignment date
custom_expected: THEN show error "Statistics have been found for the player on or after the entered placement date. "

title: Error if the player I am attempting to place on the 7 Day Concussion IL has stats from a game played on the Placement Date or after the Placement date if there is a doubleheader exception
custom_preconds:
See Business Rule #4.11.1:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786710/4.+Place+on+7-Day+Concussion+DL

See Error Messages #63:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786726/DL+-+Messages

GIVEN a user is attempting to submit a Place on 7 Day Concussion IL transaction for a player
AND player has stats from a game played on or after the Placement Date on the transaction (as shown on stats tab of profile with "Game Logs" selected)
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Approve" (all places where onSubmit rules are fired)
custom_expected:
THEN system should check if the player has any stats from a game played on or after the Placement Date
AND the system should check for all stats found on the stats table(hitting, pitching, etc)
AND if stats for a game played on the Placement date and the doubleheader checkbox is not checked, then system should show an error
BUT if the doubleheader checkbox is checked, then the player may have stats from a game that occurred on the same day as the Placement date but not after. 
AND if stats from a game that occurred after the Placement date are found with the checkbox checked, then system should show an error
AND message should be as follows:
Body:"Stats have been found for player on {0}."
AND "{0}" should be replaced with the game date that the system found stats for as "mm/dd/yyyy"
AND clicking Back should close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue (only available for the BOC) should ignore the error and continue with the transaction

title: As a user, I want to receive an error if the player I am attempting to place on the 10 Day IL has stats from a game played on the Placement Date or from a game played after the Placement date if there is a doubleheader exception
custom_preconds: cba change, Injured list, mj - place on 10 day IL, on submit rule
custom_steps:
See Business Rule #2.10: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2351723

See Error Messages #63: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2309676


See Wireframe: 
(Global form error & warning hanILing) 
http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=errors___warnings
http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=warnings

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Clicking "Submit" or "Approve" (all places where onSubmit rules are fired) will check if the player has any stats from a game played on or after the Placement Date. If stats for a game played on the Placement date and the doubleheader checkbox is not checked, then show an error.  
* If the doubleheader checkbox is checked, then the player may have stats from a game that occurred on the same day as the Placement date but not after. If stats from a game that occurred after the Placement date are found, then show an error. 
* The system will check for all stats found on the stats table. 
**Message**
**Body:**"Stats have been found for player on {0}."
* {0} to be replaced with the game date that the system found stats for as "mm/dd/yyyy" 
* Clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction.
* Clicking Ignore and Continue (only available for the BOC) will ignore the error and continue with the transaction.

title: User wants Last Game Date to populate based on player's Last Game Stats
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is attempting to create a new Place on 7-Day IL tx for a player
custom_steps: WHEN the user opens the new tx
custom_expected:
THEN the "Last Game Date" field should be populated with the latest date that appears on the stats table for that player 
AND if more than one date appears on the stats table, the most recent date should be used
AND all stats that appear on the the stats table should be used to populate the date
AND stats from a prior year can be used to populate Last Game Date
BUT if no stats appear for the player, the field should remain blank
(note that stats for spring training games will not display on stats tab but these will be included as last game date if the player played a spring training game)

title: WLP club comm batch
custom_preconds:
Update to use Stats API

AC

* Players playing in winter league will have their stats populated correctly after running the club comm batch
* The stats should match up with stats on an environment that doesn't have this change in place.

title: Verify Stats batch
custom_preconds:
This should work as it always has, but should instead call stats api rather than use the oracle DB

AC

* verify stats batch should run without error and should run in a comparable amount of time to the oracle version.
* If a player violates any of the stat based checks, then a notification should be generated for them.

title: Makeable bonus
custom_preconds:
The makeable bonus batch needs to be updated to pull stats from stats API rather than from the oracle DB.

The stat calls that are needed should already exist in the MJC stat batch

AC

* Makeable bonus batch runs successfully in a comparable amount of time to before the update
* MJC_MAKEABLE_BONUS table is populated with data and matches up with the same data as a different environment that doesnâ€™t have the new batch running on it.  (Note - there may be some differences if data has been modified: contract states changed or contract bonuses adjusted)

title: Payroll  â€“ PlayerStatsDao
custom_preconds:
Stats used on payroll for PBâ€™s.

AC

* When a player with performance bonuses is traded in midseason stats are used to determine the payroll allocation.  After this update, there should be no changes to the players bonus allocations on their payroll when updating/saving the contract.

title: ClubBAMIdBatch
custom_preconds:
BAM TEAM ID matching (affiliate profiles)

AC

* Club bam ID batch should run without error and in a comparable amount of time.
* Removing a club bam id from an affiliate profile and running the batch should see it be filled back in.

title: PIEF List
custom_preconds:
The pief lists stats should be calculated using stats API rather than the oracle stats DB

AC

* PIEF list correctly calculates playerâ€™s statistics according to the requirements.
* Stats calculated on PIEF list in an environment that doesnâ€™t have the stats API change match up with the stats where the update has been applied.

title: Transactions
custom_preconds:
Transactions are currently checking stats for players to determine whether or not the transaction is valid.

Instead of making the call to the oracle stats DB they should instead call the stats API.

AC

* IL and inactive transactions which check against stats find that if the player has a game played during the placement an error is raised.
* IL transactions â€˜last game playedâ€™ field matches up with the value from their statistics.  (note comment below)
